data.name: C.A.R.L.
data.detailed_description:
Heavily influenced by classic PC games (including Cave Story, Speedy Eggbert, and Jazz Jackrabbit), C.A.R.L. blends level-based progression with RPG & story elements for a clever and satisfying retro romp! Players are thrust into the shiny metal shoes of C.A.R.L., the Computer-Automated Resource Locator. C.A.R.L. is small, yet daring, automaton whose only directive is to find all the technology he can and return it to his intrepid engineer friend on the outside. The story unfolds as the player explores the (mostly) abandoned Kent Industries facility to find and unlock new abilities, allowing them to delve ever deeper into the farthest reaches of the compound's sprawling interior.



The D.U.M.P. (Depot of Unusable Machines and Parts) serves as your world hub and as the home of the defective robots whose insight and support will help you advance through the adventure. C.A.R.L.'s story is based around this core narrative, but progression is handled through segmented level-based sprints in which you hop onto the dangerous factory floor and collect the Tech Units guarded within.



  • Classic 2D Platformer Gameplay - Hop, skip, and jump your way through challenging gauntlets of platforming perfection!
  • Challenging Puzzles - Doors! Switches! Levers! Things that go on and off! We've got 'em all.
  • Tons of Secrets - Backtrack to completed levels with new abilities to find secret areas, and discover loads of hidden collectibles and easter eggs!
  • Charming Narrative and Characters - Meet the residents of the D.U.M.P. and lean on them to help you on your quest! C.A.R.L. will need all the help he can get to uncover the secrets and inner-workings of the facility.
  • Original 'Electro-Chiptune' Soundtrack - 8-bit and DOS-era soundchip-inspired tracks will join you for every step of C.A.R.L.'s journey.

About Us

"Us" is just me, Andrew (AKA Nintendrew), and my best friend Matt (AKA Morningstar Game Studio). We have over 15 years of experience between us building games, with titles including Draw a Stickman: EPIC, Battlepillars, A Robot Named Fight, and more. We've been working on C.A.R.L. with love for more than 2 years now (including all aspects of design, programming, art, animation, sound, and music), and we're thrilled to finally have the chance to show how far the project has come!

data.short_description: C.A.R.L. is a retro puzzle-platformer in which players take on the role of a lost robot in a mysterious factory to uncover the secrets within its walls and thwart the plans of its mastermind proprietor.
